federation.serviceSdl:
type Query {
    roomServiceCart(accountId: ID!, shipCode: String!, sailDate: String!, itemCount: Int!, subTotalMinor: Int!): RoomServiceCart
    unifiedCartSummary(accountId: ID!): UnifiedCartSummary
}

type Sailing @key(fields: "shipCode sailDate") @extends{
  shipCode: String @external
  sailDate: String @external
  status: SailingStatus!
  isOnBoard: Boolean!
  roomServiceCart(accountId: ID!): RoomServiceCart @requires(fields: "shipCode sailDate")
}

enum SailingStatus {
  UPCOMING
  ACTIVE
  CANCELLED
  COMPLETED
}

type RoomServiceCart @key(fields: "cartId") {
  cartId: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  shipCode: String
  sailDate: String
  stateRoom: String
  cartType: UnifiedCartType! # ROOM_SERVICE
  itemCount: Int!
  menuId: ID
  items: [RoomServiceCartItem!]!
  subTotalMinor: Int!
  currencyCode: String!
  isPreOrder: Boolean!
  scheduleDelivery: String
  availability: CartAvailability!
  #TODO for view cart: Cart!
}

interface UnifiedCart {
  cartId: ID!
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  itemCount: Int!
  subTotalMinor: Int!
  currencyCode: String!
  availability: CartAvailability!
}

type RoomServiceCartItem {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  quantity: Int!
  unitPriceMinor: Int!
  totalPriceMinor: Int!
  imageUrl: String
  specialInstructions: String
}

enum UnifiedCartType {
  ROOM_SERVICE
  COMMERCE
  PHOTO
  MARKETPLACE
}

type CartAvailability {
  available: Boolean!
  reason: String
  #"Ship only", "Shore only" etc.
}

type UnifiedCartSummary {
  totalItemCount: Int!
  totalValueMinor: Int!
  currencyCode: String!
  sailings: [SailingCartSummary!]!
}

type SailingCartSummary {
  shipCode: String!
  sailDate: String!
  carts: [CartSummary!]!
}

type CartSummary {
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  itemCount: Int!
  subtotalMinor: Int!
  availability: CartAvailability!
}

engineConfig.graphqlSchema:
schema {
  query: Query
}

type Guest {
  accountId: ID!
  email: String
  name: String
  sailings(first: Int, status: [SailingStatus]): [Sailing]
}

type Query {
  guest(accountId: ID!): Guest
  sailings(accountId: String, first: Int, status: [SailingStatus]): [Sailing]
  roomServiceCart(accountId: ID!, shipCode: String!, sailDate: String!, itemCount: Int!, subTotalMinor: Int!): RoomServiceCart
  unifiedCartSummary(accountId: ID!): UnifiedCartSummary
}

type Sailing {
  isOnBoard: Boolean!
  sailDate: String
  shipCode: String
  status: SailingStatus!
  roomServiceCart(accountId: ID!): RoomServiceCart
}

enum SailingStatus {
  ACTIVE
  CANCELLED
  COMPLETED
  UPCOMING
}

type RoomServiceCart {
  cartId: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  shipCode: String
  sailDate: String
  stateRoom: String
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  itemCount: Int!
  menuId: ID
  items: [RoomServiceCartItem!]!
  subTotalMinor: Int!
  currencyCode: String!
  isPreOrder: Boolean!
  scheduleDelivery: String
  availability: CartAvailability!
}

interface UnifiedCart {
  cartId: ID!
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  itemCount: Int!
  subTotalMinor: Int!
  currencyCode: String!
  availability: CartAvailability!
}

type RoomServiceCartItem {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  quantity: Int!
  unitPriceMinor: Int!
  totalPriceMinor: Int!
  imageUrl: String
  specialInstructions: String
}

enum UnifiedCartType {
  ROOM_SERVICE
  COMMERCE
  PHOTO
  MARKETPLACE
}

type CartAvailability {
  available: Boolean!
  reason: String
}

type UnifiedCartSummary {
  totalItemCount: Int!
  totalValueMinor: Int!
  currencyCode: String!
  sailings: [SailingCartSummary!]!
}

type SailingCartSummary {
  shipCode: String!
  sailDate: String!
  carts: [CartSummary!]!
}

type CartSummary {
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  itemCount: Int!
  subtotalMinor: Int!
  availability: CartAvailability!
}

stringStorage.85c8d32718095b69965770588f8ecf24d07f1622:
schema {
  query: Query
}

directive @extends on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @external on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @key(fields: openfed__FieldSet!, resolvable: Boolean = true) repeatable on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @requires(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

type CartAvailability {
  available: Boolean!
  reason: String
}

type CartSummary {
  availability: CartAvailability!
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  itemCount: Int!
  subtotalMinor: Int!
}

type Query {
  roomServiceCart(accountId: ID!, itemCount: Int!, sailDate: String!, shipCode: String!, subTotalMinor: Int!): RoomServiceCart
  unifiedCartSummary(accountId: ID!): UnifiedCartSummary
}

type RoomServiceCart @key(fields: "cartId") {
  accountId: ID!
  availability: CartAvailability!
  cartId: ID!
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  currencyCode: String!
  isPreOrder: Boolean!
  itemCount: Int!
  items: [RoomServiceCartItem!]!
  menuId: ID
  sailDate: String
  scheduleDelivery: String
  shipCode: String
  stateRoom: String
  subTotalMinor: Int!
}

type RoomServiceCartItem {
  id: ID!
  imageUrl: String
  name: String!
  quantity: Int!
  specialInstructions: String
  totalPriceMinor: Int!
  unitPriceMinor: Int!
}

type Sailing @key(fields: "shipCode sailDate") @extends {
  isOnBoard: Boolean!
  roomServiceCart(accountId: ID!): RoomServiceCart @requires(fields: "shipCode sailDate")
  sailDate: String @external
  shipCode: String @external
  status: SailingStatus!
}

type SailingCartSummary {
  carts: [CartSummary!]!
  sailDate: String!
  shipCode: String!
}

enum SailingStatus {
  ACTIVE
  CANCELLED
  COMPLETED
  UPCOMING
}

interface UnifiedCart {
  availability: CartAvailability!
  cartId: ID!
  cartType: UnifiedCartType!
  currencyCode: String!
  itemCount: Int!
  subTotalMinor: Int!
}

type UnifiedCartSummary {
  currencyCode: String!
  sailings: [SailingCartSummary!]!
  totalItemCount: Int!
  totalValueMinor: Int!
}

enum UnifiedCartType {
  COMMERCE
  MARKETPLACE
  PHOTO
  ROOM_SERVICE
}

scalar openfed__FieldSet
